lead_paragraph: Khalid Khannouchi, the Moroccan-born American who has twice broken the world record for the marathon, withdrew from Sunday’s NYC Half-Marathon.“It’s not an injury,” said Sandra Khannouchi, his wife, coach and manager. “He has a mechanical problem. His foot lands flat, and he has a burning sensation.”.
